Package
Description
se.swedenconnect.security.credential.factory
Spring factory beans for creating credential objects.

  • Uses of KeyStoreBuilder in se.swedenconnect.security.credential.factory

    Methods in se.swedenconnect.security.credential.factory that return KeyStoreBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.builder()
    Creates a KeyStoreBuilder that uses the DefaultConfigurationResourceLoader to load resources.
    static KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.builder(ConfigurationResourceLoader resourceLoader)
    Creates a KeyStoreBuilder that uses the supplied ConfigurationResourceLoader to load resources.
    KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.location(String location)
    Assigns the location for the KeyStore.
    KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.password(String password)
    Assigns the key store password.
    KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.pin(String pin)
    Assigns the PIN, which is the same as the key store password.
    KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.pkcs11ConfigurationFile(String pkcs11ConfigurationFile)
    Assigns the full path to the PKCS#11 configuration file (for PKCS#11 key stores).
    KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.pkcs11Library(String pkcs11Library)
    As an alternative to assigning the PKCS#11 configuration file, each PKCS#11 setting may be supplied separately.
    KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.pkcs11Slot(String pkcs11Slot)
    As an alternative to assigning the PKCS#11 configuration file, each PKCS#11 setting may be supplied separately.
    KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.pkcs11SlotListIndex(Integer pkcs11SlotListIndex)
    As an alternative to assigning the PKCS#11 configuration file, each PKCS#11 setting may be supplied separately.
    KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.pkcs11SlotName(String pkcs11SlotName)
    As an alternative to assigning the PKCS#11 configuration file, each PKCS#11 setting may be supplied separately.
    KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.provider(String provider)
    Assigns the name of the security Provider to use.
    KeyStoreBuilder
    KeyStoreBuilder.type(String type)
    Assigns the KeyStore type.
